components.name: Runtime
components.description: Generic bucket for uncategorized runtime issues

components.name: Titanium SDK
components.description: Any integration or issues with the TiSDK

fields.description:
h2. problem

Android & Mobileweb have some issues rendering the dynamic_styling app's UI, listed here respectively:
* TIMOB-14753
* TIMOB-14754

Slight adjustments should be made to the appear to avoid the appearance of these UI bugs in the Alloy app

h2. expected

The app should lay out the UI and behave similarly across all supported platforms.
fields.summary: Update dynamic_styling test app to account for TIMOB UI bugs

comments.body:
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/209

Fix available in 1.2.0-alpha5

[~fcasali] this change should address the errors in the TIMOB tickets above that you referenced in our email. Please confirm that the dynamic_styling app behaves as you would expect with respect to these changes.

Confirming the dynamic_styling app is behaving as expected after the changes (both Android and MobileWeb).

Titanium SDK 3.1.2.v20130806034554
Alloy 1.2.0-alpha6
Appcelerator Studio 3.1.2.201308021524
CLI 3.1.1
Node 0.10.13

PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/234

The dynamic_styling test app should work as expected for Mobileweb now.
